ref: 13023 *saṁvidīpayati ʻ makes burn ʼ. [sáṁdīpayati ʻ kindles ʼ RV., vidīpayati ʻ makes flame ʼ MBh. -- √dīp]
Si. avulanavā ʻ to shine ʼ, avulavanavā ʻ to kindle, excite ʼ, hävilenavā, äv˚ ʻ to catch fire ʼ (for -- l -- see pradīpa -- ). -- But the vocalism is difficult: poss., despite h -- , < *āpōḍ -- .
